page.title: 07ROADS
page.content: The two main roads in our block are called Durham Road and Junction Road These are two important{arterial roads the former connecting Stockton to the towns and villages in a northerly direction en route to the city of Durham. The latter connects the outlying parts of Stockton to the towns of Norton and more importantly to the chemical manufacturing centre of I.C.I.Billingham.Both roads are constantly busy carrying various forms of{transport}and giving{access to important urban and rural districts Both these roads are busy with all the usual vehicles as well as being{bus {routes.}Heavy vehicles are banned from Junction Road as part of an urban improvement plan.There is a pedestrian crossing to enable children attending the comprehensive school to cross busy Junction Road from Roseworth Estate.
